am_mcu_apollo.h File Reference

Top Include for apollo330P class devices. More...

Detailed Description

Top Include for apollo330P class devices.

This file provides all the includes necessary for an apollo device.

#include <arm_cmse.h>
#include <stdarg.h>
#include <stdbool.h>
